title: "Superior phase recovery and hologram reconstruction using a deep neural network"
excerpt: "UCLA researchers demonstrate a deep learning framework, termed Fourier Imager Network (FIN), to perform end-to-end phase recovery and image reconstruction from raw holograms, achieving unprecedented success in generalization to new types of samples."
